headline: Renewable Energy Stocks Q4 Results: Benchmarking Shoals (NASDAQ:SHLS)
summary: The end of an earnings season can be a great time to discover new stocks and assess how companies are handling the current business environment. Let’s take a look at how Shoals (NASDAQ:SHLS) and the rest of the renewable energy stocks fared in Q4.

headline: First Solar: One Of The Few Tariff Winners, Priced Cheap
summary: First Solar stands to benefit from US reindustrialization policies, despite potential tax credit cutbacks under the current administration. Read more about FSLR stock here.

headline: First Solar: My Favorite Green Energy Stock, Climate-Change Fears Will Return
summary: First Solar's stock has been hit by recession fears and potential cuts to U.S. solar incentives. Read why I maintain my buy rating on FSLR.
